body.raw:
{
    "company_id": 18,
    "rule_name": "Eng Team for Life!!!",
    "rule_type": "BIRTHDAY",
    "cadence": "RECURRING",
    "cadence_type": "YEAR",
    "cadence_value": [1,5,10],
    "trigger_field": "promoted_on",
    "timing_type": "DAY_OF",
    "sending_time": "9:00 AM",
    "timezone": "PST",
    "manager_id": 12345,
    "sending_managers_account_id": 12,
    "sending_managers_program_id": 68,
    "bucket_customization_id": 5233,
    "subject": "a reward subject",
    "memo": "this is a memo",
    "recipient_note": "Test create Note",
    "company_values": ["these", "are", "values"],
    "created_by": 12345,
    "segment_by": [
        {
        "field": "department",
        "operator": "=",
        "values": ["eng", "sales"]
        },
        {
        "field": "location",
        "operator": "!=",
        "values": ["New York", "San Diego"]
        }
    ]
}
